sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import BookList from "./BookList"; import SearchBook from "./SearchBook"; import { Switch, Route } from "react-router-dom"; import * as BooksAPI from "./BooksAPI"; import {useEffect} from 'react'; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { this.fetchMyBooks(); }, []); fetchMyBooks = () => { this.setState({ isFetchingBooks: true }); BooksAPI.getAll() .then(books => { if (!books.length) { this.setState({ fetchingError: undefined, isFetchingBooks: false }); } else { this.setState({ myBooks: books, fetchingError: undefined, isFetchingBooks: false }); } }) .catch(err => { this.setState({ fetchingError: "There was an error loading your books, please check your connection", isFetchingBooks: false }); }); }; changeBookShelf = (book, shelf) => { book.shelf = shelf; this.setState(prevState => ({ myBooks: prevState.myBooks.filter(b => b.id !== book.id).concat([book]) })); BooksAPI.update(book, shelf); }; const { myBooks, error, fetchingError, isFetchingBooks } = this.state; const { changeBookShelf, fetchMyBooks } = this; return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

    1. To Kill a Mockingbird
      Harper Lee
    2. Ender's Game
      Orson Scott Card

    Want to Read

    1. 1776
      David McCullough
    2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
      J.K. Rowling

    Read

    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
